meanings.sent1: The farmer was centupling his crop yield by using advanced fertilizers.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to centuple their efforts to reach their sales target.
meanings.sent3: The magician's wand seemed to have the power of centupling objects in an instant!
meanings.sent4: Her smile had the magical effect of centupling the joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's strength was centupling with each battle he won.

meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient had the power of centupling the flavors in the dish.
meanings.sent4: His words had the impact of centupling the excitement in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The artist's creativity was centupling with each new painting.
